channel.title: CVE Feed for Zorem -- Advanced Shipment Tracking for WooCommerce
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Zorem -- Advanced Shipment Tracking for WooCommerce

item.title: CVE-2021-4347|2024-08-03T17:23:10.683Z -- zorem -- advanced%20shipment%20tracking%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: The function update_shipment_status_email_status_fun in the plugin Advanced Shipment Tracking for WooCommerce in versions up to 3.2.6 is vulnerable to authenticated arbitrary options update. The function allows attackers (including those at customer level) to update any WordPress option in the database. Version 3.2.5 was initially released as a fix, but doesn't fully address the issue.

item.title: CVE-2022-41635|2024-08-03T12:49:43.588Z -- zorem -- advanced%20shipment%20tracking%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Zorem Advanced Shipment Tracking for WooCommerce plugin <=Â 3.5.2 versions.
